Articles.Content:
Hey Guys and Girls!

I posted a couple of weeks back asking for some help with newbie stuff (circularizing and aligning orbits in order to dock!) and a bunch of you posted some great advice so wanted to say thanks (I would have inserted a screen shot but I'm still working out how to attach it to the post!).

I have to admit I did cheat a little bit I used Mech Jeb to get into a stable orbit (I got sick of keep having to launch new capsules every time I messed up and I could to that part!)

Anyway thanks to you all, Mun or Bust (or any other suggestions of what to do next?)!

Hiya scott_e, welcome back

MechJeb isn't cheating at all and is a great learning aid

Have fun and fly safe!

I have to admit I did cheat a little bit I used Mech Jeb to get into a stable orbit (I got sick of keep having to launch new capsules every time I messed up and I could to that part!)

Anyway thanks to you all, Mun or Bust (or any other suggestions of what to do next?)!

I use mechjeb all the time (currently trying out v2) - and it not cheating cause it teaches you a lot just by watching how it does things...

Suggestions? - try making some parts and then joining them together in orbit around kerbin (hey presto you will have built a space station)
